Posts.Content: Apologies, new to website and have responded to the wrong person , sorry x
Posts.Title: Follow up mammograms

Posts.Content: Interesting to note that you had a subtle miss too on the mammogram. I was diagnosed with having breast cancer, 7 months after a clear mammogram, January 17 Surgeon advised me it was a subtle miss as only one of three radiologists spotted cancer on my May 16 mammogram. Just wondered how often this happens?
Posts.Title: Follow up mammograms
